data.title: Your new hometown on the Mississippi Gulf Coast
data.text:
CHARMING. CONVENIENT. WELL PLANNED. PERFECT.

AT TRADITION, MISSISSIPPI, YOU CAN LIVE LIFE LIKE IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE LIVED.

Tradition, Mississippi, is the state’s newest coastal town. This special place is beloved for its scenic natural beauty, the delightful architecture of the neighborhoods, the small town feel combined with modern amenities, and its location in the heart of everything that makes living on the Gulf Coast the dream of so many people.

This is the largest master planned community under development in Mississippi. At full build-out, the 4,900-acre town will have more than 15,000 residential units, two million square feet of commercial development, and 35,000 residents—the perfect small town designed to give you the life you dream of living.

Visit Tradition once. Remember how comfortable you feel. You’ll want to live here forever.
